actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the treatment of certain higher education loans from qualified employer plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow higher education loans from qualified employer plans to be repaid within 15 (instead of five) years. Describes a reasonable interest rate for such loans which will exempt them from the tax on prohibited transactions. Exempts such loans from the tax treatment applicable to loans with below-market interest rates.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the treatment of certain higher education loans from qualified employer plans.
